app.layout.title: Vivian & Davy
components.flyouts.invitation.descriptio: Get a secret link sent to your email to view your invitation.
components.flyouts.invitation.errors.inv: The email should be formatted like username@domain.com.
components.flyouts.invitation.errors.not: Your email was not found on the guest list. Let the host know.
components.flyouts.invitation.messages.e:
We have sent an email to {{email}}.

The email may be sent to your junk mail. If so, please add host@vivian-and-davy.com to your whitelist.
components.flyouts.invitation.title: Guest Invitation
components.flyouts.rsvp.errors.missing-a: Please let us know if you are attending.
components.flyouts.rsvp.errors.missing-m: Please leave a message for the bride and groom.
components.flyouts.rsvp.guests.descripti: Your guest party has multiple members. You may select and respond on behalf of your other party members.
components.flyouts.rsvp.questions.attend: 1. Will you be able to join us at our wedding? Kindly reply by the date of March 31, 2024.
components.flyouts.rsvp.questions.dietar: 3. Do you have any dietary restrictions or food allergies that we should be aware of? Leave blank if none.
components.flyouts.rsvp.questions.entree: 2. Please indicate the entrée option you wish to be served.
components.flyouts.rsvp.questions.mailin: 4. What is your mailing address for post-wedding postage. Leave this blank if you do not wish to receive it.
components.flyouts.rsvp.questions.messag: 5. Share how you know the couple, wish them well or some wisdom for the future!
components.flyouts.rsvp.title: RSVP
components.landing.answers.how-to-respon: You can respond on our wedding website by clicking on the "Invitation" button at the top. You will be prompted for your email address to receive an email with a secret link to submit your RSVP. After accessing the secret link, the "Invitation" button will be replaced with a "RSVP" button to modify your RSVP in the future.
components.landing.answers.i-did-not-rec: The email may be sent to your junk mail. Please add host@vivian-and-davy.com to your whitelist to ensure our emails arrive in your inbox.
components.landing.answers.where-is-the-: The event details will be emailed to guests in an official invitation at a later date. Please occasionally visit this website because more updates will be available leading up to the event.
components.landing.questions.how-to-resp: How can I respond to the invitation?
components.landing.questions.i-did-not-r: I did not receive any emails for the event. What do I do?
components.landing.questions.where-is-th: Where will the ceremony and reception take place?
